Apply shadows with dependency management

Source: R/margot-shadow-dependencies.R
apply_shadows_with_dependencies.Rd

Apply shadows with dependency management

Usage

apply_shadows_with_dependencies(
  data,
  shadows,
  reorder = TRUE,
  update_params = TRUE
)

Arguments

data

Data to apply shadows to

shadows

List of shadow objects

reorder

Logical, whether to reorder shadows by dependencies

update_params

Logical, whether to update parameters based on dependencies

Value

List with shadowed data and diagnostics
